song.title: Giana Sisters (Keep Da Scene Alive)
song.info:
Lyrics:
HYEAH!
It's time to press play on tape 'cus Here comes the SID attackers Yeah! Going out to the remix trackers Yeah! Respect to the man with a SID in his hand You've got to dance with your feat to the Commodore beat C'mon! Respect to you with 64 as IQ
There's no need to push, there's plenty of room for everyone
Here comes the heroes
Rob Hubbard Galway Daglish Whittaker Joseph HÃ¼lsbeck Cooksie Laxity
Fred Gray Danko Gilmore Schneider Norman Jeroen Tel Reyn Ouwehand and Future Freak
Walker Stember Bjaeregaard Barry Leich Drax The Follins Deenan Clark Yip Doc and FAME
It's time for the remixers of the world
Instant Remedy Larsec Feekzoid LMan Donne Sonic Wanderer Abbott Glyr R Brown O2 Mahoney Valden And DHS
C'mon
N-JOY Makke THC Sumppi Dead Guys Detert - AGAIN Schneider - AGAIN FTC Breebaart Marchine Supremacy And Press Play On Tape
C'mon! Yeah!
And of course to everyone who keep the scene alive Like Slaygon, Neil and Don Kwed.
Keep the scene alive
--------------------- Makke's notes:
"If I remember correctly, I recorded the vocals for this in a few different takes, and Thomas Detert was mentioned in both heroes and remixers in one. But in the final version he's only in the remixers section, making the AGAIN! shout a bit strange. :) "
